superhero.title: Help your students become superheroes!
superhero.body: Join our highly supportive Professional Learning Program for middle and high school educators.

hoc-2024.title: Register your Hour of Code
hoc-2024.body: Join us December 9th-15th for Computer Science Education Week and help us bring what students love to life!

curriculum-launch-2024.title: Discover new and updated curriculum!
curriculum-launch-2024.body: Explore our latest units and professional learning resources to inspire future tech innovators.

user-research-aug-2024.title: Help shape the future of Code.org
user-research-aug-2024.body: Your classroom experience and feedback can help shape improvements to Code.org for all teachers. Join our research community to share your insights, try out new features, and pilot new courses.

transformers-sept-2024.title: Get in the fun! Easy-to-learn code with Transformers One
transformers-sept-2024.body: Autobots, roll out! In this Transformers One-themed introduction to our Sprite Lab, students learn the basics of computer science by building fun, interactive projects.

gen-ai-launch-2024.title: Exploring Generative AI
gen-ai-launch-2024.body: Prepare your students for the future with an engaging curriculum that demystifies generative AI. Through hands-on projects and ethical discussions, students gain the skills to become creators and critical thinkers in an AI-powered world.
